Key:
Oh! I-I'm so sorry, Tohka! I just remembered
something! I-I'll see you later!

Hm?! Wh-What do you mean?! Where are you
going, Shido?!
No one's following me, right...?

I was sure rude to Tohka... Then again, I felt
bad eating Rinne's bento in front of her...
I'm starving, so I'll eat it...
Oh, Shido-san. Hello.
...Hm? Kurumi?
Are you alone?

N-Not because I don't have anyone to eat
with. I-I just had a situation to deal with...

Hehe... I wasn't saying anything.
...May I sit next to you?
Huh...? S-Sure, I don't mind...
Then, excuse me.

My... Don't mind me. You can go ahead
and eat.
O-Okay... Sorry.
No problem.

It's hard for me to eat when you're staring
like that.

Why? Who cares? It's not like you've got
anything to lose.
Yeah, but...

(Having her stare at me while I eat is
uncomfortable. Maybe I should change
the topic...)
U-Um... about that thing, the other day...
...Oh, about that time at the lake?
Yeah... That was... a crocodile, right?
Yes. It had escaped from the zoo.

Wait, the zoo was on the news... The one
whose owner had died...?

That's right. Something odd is going on in
that zoo.
Odd?

It's not a big deal. Besides, the crocodile is
doing fine. I've taken it under my wing...

Under your wing...? That big thing? Shouldn't
you hurry up and return it to the zoo?
I... refuse to do so.
Huh...?
It's too sad to put it back in the small cage.
Okay, but...

Living within confines, watching every moment
of your life pass you by. How is that any
different from death?
I guess you have a point, to an extent...

If possible, I would like to find a place where
it can be set free...

You shouldn't. Do you want the zoo to go
out of business? Besides, can zoo animals
even re-enter the wild?

Hehe... I wonder about that. It may be
a part of nature.

(That's too cruel. Even for cats and dogs,
once they experience being fed, they can't
just go back to living on the street.)
Oh, crap... Lunch time's over.
Oh, that went by fast...

Well, I'll be off now. What are you going to
do, Kurumi?

Hm... Good question. It's not like I can
sneak into class, so I'll be on my way.
I see. Well, later, Kurumi.
Okay, goodbye...
